name: Neurotoxic BATTLE DEMO
description:
Neurotoxic is a Horror RPG set in 2010 and this is the BATTLE DEMO version of the game! The game is similar to the Shin Megami Tensei series and Deltarune. Later on in 2023 there will be a real demo of the game, so enjoy this small appetizer!

Credits:

Programming: Deadheatdoom, Aria#3086

Visuals: Deadheatdoom, Byocore, Loam

Main Menu Theme: Loam

- CONTROLS -

Z - Confirm

X - Back

C - Menu

SHIFT - Run

USE THE ARROW KEYS
